patterns.name: supabase-service-role-jwt
patterns.rationale: Detects Supabase service role JWTs â€” all share this static header prefix.
patterns.false_positive_analysis: This exact base64 segment is the JWT header for HS256 tokens only; legitimate proof log content (migration hashes, manifest SHA256s) use different encodings and will not match.

patterns.name: postgres-connection-string
patterns.rationale: Detects Postgres connection strings which may contain embedded credentials.
patterns.false_positive_analysis: Legitimate proof logs do not contain connection strings; gate output and status messages reference DB by name only, not URI.

patterns.name: supabase-personal-access-token
patterns.rationale: Detects Supabase personal access tokens which always begin with sbp_.
patterns.false_positive_analysis: The sbp_ prefix is a Supabase-specific token namespace; no legitimate proof log content uses this prefix in any other context.
